name: blurrily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not clear to see: An image appeared blurrily on the screen.
in a way that shows you are not thinking or seeing clearly, often because you have just woken up: He rubbed his eyes and looked at me blurrily.
More examplesFewer examplesStreetlights shone blurrily through the rain-spattered window.The picture shows a blurrily sketched figure of a girl.His left eye was far from perfect but able to see blurrily.She blurrily got out of bed and stumbled across the room.I looked blurrily at the letter, unable to make any sense of it.
